title: IceTheme IT Africa Nature (Wildlife) Joomla Template
description:
Inspired from the wild life, IT Africa Premium Joomla Theme brings to life a sense of openness and connection

We at IceTheme love nature and the beauty that surrounds our everyday life. Not that we live with lions on the safari, but for us, when it came to be inspired from nature, there is no more perfect place than the old African continent. LetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s see why our latest Premium Theme its named after the Ã¢â‚¬Å“wild continentÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½.

Within a first look into our Demo you will notice a big slideshow with some amazing transitions to impact your visitors. We know that the first few seconds are the most important, so why not impress your users. We have chosen the random transition effect, but of course you may choose the one that fits best to your project.

On the other hand, the overall design its clean, open and focused on spaces. You will find 6 available template styles to choose from which are all based on the African colors like the strong red or brown earth (on the menu and on the footer) They will communicate your visitors a sense of freedom and connection.

We know that you want to integrate your favorite social media on your website. You may easily do this with our IT Africa theme. There are parameters accessible from the template configuration, ready for you to play with them. Also, you will find there other needed parameters like the style variation color, parameter to show weather, option to chose logo and some other useful parameters as well.

As our latest Premium Joomla Themes, IT Africa, its fully responsive template, means that it will fully adapt on all kind of devices, from large desktops to your users browsing in their pajamas with an iPhone device.

Awesome features

Fully responsive Joomla 3.x theme
Full Slideshow with amazing transitions
Awesome Design inspired from Africa
6 Beautiful Template Styles
Customized Blog section
8 Custom pages
Built in with LESS CSS
Bootstrap framework ready
